title: Remembering Cokie Roberts: A labor of love, a labor of grief
description: Steven Roberts remembers his wife, Cokie. He sits down with Chuck to talk about their shared career in journalism and Washington politics.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
